home.headline: Guidance forward for complex medical decisions.
home.subheadline: MaryForward helps patients and families move from uncertainty to a plan—by translating trusted medical sources into clear options, questions to ask, and next steps, with expert review for safety.
home.maryDescription: Built to bring clarity and momentum to families navigating oncology and infectious disease.
home.benefit1: Structured intake tailored to oncology and infectious disease.
home.benefit2: Evidence synthesis from vetted sources (guidelines, peer-reviewed literature, trials registries).
home.benefit3: Expert annotation and a next-step checklist for your appointment.
home.benefit4: Follow-up tracking: outcomes, side effects, trial status, reminders.
home.disclaimer: MaryForward is decision support and navigation—not emergency care. If you have urgent symptoms, call 911 or go to the nearest emergency department.
home.forPatientsDesc: Clarity, options, and questions to ask—delivered in plain language and backed by citations.
home.forCliniciansDesc: Structured summaries with citations and collaboration workflows—designed to save time.
home.forSponsorsDesc: Educational partnerships and listings designed to avoid referral contingency.
home.step1Desc: Secure account creation, guided questionnaires, document upload, and (when available) EHR import.
home.step2Desc: LLM + retrieval over vetted sources to surface a differential, treatments, safety flags, and unanswered questions.
home.step3Desc: Specialists review, validate, and annotate drafts before sharing for safety and clarity.
home.step4Desc: Plain-language + clinician-level reports designed to support productive conversations with your care team.
home.ngsDesc: Upload genomic profiling or infectious-disease mNGS reports. We map variants/organisms to actionability with citations and cautionary notes.
home.trialsDesc: Eligibility extraction, geo-filtering, and concierge templates to accelerate trial discovery and outreach.

footer.tagline: Guidance forward for complex medical decisions — expert-reviewed decision support for oncology and infectious disease.
footer.honourDescription: Built to help families move from uncertainty to a plan — with clarity, compassion, and evidence.

consent.welcomeSubtitle: Before we begin, please review and accept our terms of service and patient consent form.

consent.saveError: Failed to save consent. Please try again.

consent.termsIntro: MaryForward provides an online platform connecting patients with qualified oncology specialists for second opinion consultations. By using our services, you acknowledge and agree to the following:
consent.natureOfServiceText: MaryForward facilitates expert medical opinion consultations. These are advisory in nature and do not establish a physician-patient relationship with our reviewing clinicians.
consent.reviewProcessText: Your case will be reviewed by licensed oncology professionals who will provide their expert assessment based on the medical records and information you submit.
consent.infoAccuracyText: The quality of our consultation depends on the accuracy and completeness of the information you provide. You are responsible for ensuring all submitted records are accurate and up-to-date.
consent.clinicalTrialsInfoText: Information about clinical trials is provided for educational purposes. Eligibility and availability may change. Always verify current status with the trial sponsor.
consent.noPatientRelationshipText: Our service provides second opinions only. We do not replace your primary oncologist or healthcare team. All treatment decisions should be made in consultation with your treating physicians.
consent.emergencyText: MaryForward is not an emergency service. If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please contact your local emergency services or go to the nearest emergency room immediately.
consent.liabilityText: MaryForward and its affiliated clinicians provide opinions based on available information. We are not liable for treatment decisions made based on our consultations.
consent.termsCheckbox: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and understand that MaryForward provides second opinion consultations only.
consent.purposeText: This consent authorizes MaryForward to collect, store, and share your medical information with qualified oncology specialists for the purpose of providing a second opinion consultation.
consent.consentToShareIntro: By providing consent, you authorize the sharing of your medical information with:
consent.shareItem1: Licensed oncology specialists on our platform
consent.shareItem2: Medical professionals involved in your case review
consent.shareItem3: Our secure technology systems for record storage
consent.shareItem5: Research partners (in de-identified form, if applicable)
consent.consentToShareOutro: Your information will only be used for the stated purposes and will be protected according to applicable privacy laws.
consent.privacyText: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your medical information. Access is limited to authorized personnel only.
consent.deidentifiedDataIntro: We may use de-identified data (information that cannot be traced back to you) for:
consent.limitationItem1: Second opinions are advisory and do not replace your primary care
consent.limitationItem2: Treatment decisions remain between you and your treating physicians
consent.limitationItem3: Response times may vary based on case complexity
consent.communicationText: You consent to receive communications from MaryForward regarding your case, including updates, reports, and service-related notifications.
consent.voluntaryText: Your participation is voluntary. You may withdraw consent at any time by contacting our support team, though this may affect our ability to provide services.
consent.questionsText: If you have questions about this consent or our privacy practices, please contact our support team before proceeding.
consent.consentCheckbox: I consent to the collection, storage, and sharing of my medical information as described above for the purpose of receiving a second opinion consultation.
consent.signatureNotice: By clicking the button below, you are providing your electronic signature and confirming that you have read, understood, and agree to both the Terms of Service and Patient Consent Form.
consent.pleaseAcceptBoth: Please accept both agreements above to continue
